comment: Other dex apps exist but this one rocks. Fluid, useful, clean.

title: good job
comment: love it

title: Great app awesome features
comment: Love the fact someone is standing behind something they make. And the wishlist feature is sick lol

title: Would be even better if..
comment: It had key quest icons xD that way I'd never have to leave the app. That should be added as a feature but as is, the app is beyond compare. Great job guys!

title: Perfect! This is complete!
comment: Everything a MH3U compendium app should be. Seriously, this is the only one you need, it has everything. EVERYTHING!

title: Best MH3U database app
comment: Needs sorting, searching, and filtering options to make it absolutely perfect! Also wanted to suggest completing the weapon tree with branches when viewing individual weapons.

title: Great resource
comment: Finally a completed android Dex!

title: Best app for hunting.
comment: Has every aspect other apps lack. Complete.

title: Awesome app
comment: Perfect companion app for MH3U! All the info you can need in one place. Weapons, drops, monster info, maps, quests...

title: Beautiful.
comment: Clean, simple interface and works great. Thank you for this, would love to see something similar for 4U's release.

title: It's complete!
comment: One of the few completed apps of it's kind. Nice interface and looks good on my plethora of devices. No complaints!
The best MH3U phone database I've used so far. The wishlist helps loads.

title: Amazing app
comment: Great app with a clean interface and plenty of knowledge. Quick access to weapon trees, monsters and quest info

title: Most complete app out there
comment: This app is the best one I've found so far for monster hunter, and I use it a lot since I'm a beginner in the series. The only thing that I can think of as a possible improvement is if the app included images of each weapon, though I understand that might be difficult due to the number of weapons.
This is real helpful, i can have my phone as a useful database by my side while i play mh3u!

title: Finally, a complete database!
comment: No longer do I have to rely on 2 different apps to get the information I need for MH3U. That alone is worth 5 stars. The wishlist feature is icing on the cake, and the lack of cost and permissions make me happy. My only quibble is the icon. Cha-Cha annoys me. Kayamba is best Shakalaka.
Most complete offline database. Great stuff.

title: Yes
comment: Its perfect

title: Great.
comment: Only thing lacking is the "key" quest marker for each ranking.

title: Very well done.
comment: Infinitely useful app.

title: Amazing
comment: I didn't even know it existed haha, it's by far the best app for MH3U

title: Excellent
comment: I've yet to find flaws.  Still looking though!

title: Amazing App, One Suggestion
comment: I love this app. I actually had 3 different MH3U apps installed on my phone because each was missing something that the other had. Almost everything seems to be here. The only thing missing that I've seen so far is in the quest list it doesn't show what quests are key for that star tier.   Other than that it's got pretty much everything I can ask for, combine list, location maps with gathering info, skills, every item in the game, all the weapons, armor, and decorations and how to make them. Plus the wishlist feature is an AWESOME addition. It's really nice to be able to track how much stuff I need for items. I had been doing this with a notepad pulled up on my phone for the longest time. Nice job! Please just add the key quests to the quest list and it will be perfect.
Fast and complete!

title: Found through Reddit
comment: Saw this while scrolling through my reddit feed, noticed it was offline app. You guys have done a stellar job with this! Hope you guys decide to continue and make one for 4U in 2015.

title: Best MH3U app yet!
comment: Easily the best MH3U app. An accurate and complete set of data coupled with an intuitive and pleasant interface.

title: Perfect!
comment: Incredibly useful. Data pops up instantly, much faster than trying to use the wikis on mobile. Clean, simple design. Easy to find the info quickly.

title: Best One Of Its Kind
comment: The best MH3U database app on the play store, it's fast, easy to read and is actually complete! All it needs is an all wide search function and it will be near perfect.
Perfect app so far,can't find any problems with it.
